1. City Council

City Council
============

1. Find more information about elections in the City of Wilmer.
2. #### [Mayor & City Council](https://www.cityofwilmer.net/228/Mayor-City-Council)

   The Wilmer City Council is comprised of a Mayor and five Council Members, which are elected at large on staggered two-year terms.
3. #### [Mayor's Message](https://www.cityofwilmer.net/DocumentCenter/View/4909/2024-Mayors-Welcome-Letter)
4. #### [Mayor Petta's Bio](https://www.cityofwilmer.net/DocumentCenter/View/4747/Sheila-Petta---Bio)

![](https://www.cityofwilmer.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6643)


At the May 13th Canvassing Meeting, City Secretary Rios administered Oath of Office and swore-in Sheila Petta, Sergio Campos, and Laura Jacobs. Following, Mayor Petta presented the Certificate of Election to serve a two-year term.
